QueryResult.text: select sec.user_id, sec.object_instance_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 sec where 1 = 1 and sec.object_id in ( select id from CMN_SEC_OBJECTS where object_code in ('RIM_RISK_ISSUE','INV_IDEA') and object_type_code = 'RECORD' UNION select sec.id from cmn_sec_objects sec, odf_objects obj where sec.object_code = concat('odf_cst_', obj.code) and obj.template_extension = 'inv_extension' and sec.component_code = 'INV' and sec.object_type_code = 'RECORD' ) and sec.permission_code in ('READ','RICView' )
